General.Name: ADENTRA Inc.
General.Description: ADENTRA Inc. engages in the wholesale distribution of architectural building products to the residential, repair and remodel, and commercial construction markets in Canada and the United States. It offers doors, decorative surfaces, moldings, stair parts, hardwood lumber, hardwood plywood, composite panels, and other building products to industrial manufacturers, home builder distribution yards, home centers, and architects and designers. The company was formerly known as Hardwoods Distribution Inc. and changed its name to ADENTRA Inc. in December 2022. ADENTRA Inc. was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Langley, Canada.
